Subject: Offer Of Employment

On behalf of {{ doc.company }}., we are delighted to extend an offer of employment to you. Please find below a summary of the terms and conditions for your anticipated employment with us:

Designation: {{ doc.designation }}

Grade: {{ doc.grade }}

Reporting: You will be reporting to {{ doc.designation }}

Posting: {{ doc.custom_posting_location }}

Remuneration : Your Annual CTC will be {% if (doc.custom_offered_ctc | float) > (doc.base | float) %} {{ (doc.custom_offered_ctc | float) * 12 | int }} {% else %} {{ (doc.base | float) * 12 | int }} {% endif %}/- ({{ doc.custom_total_amount_inr }})

The Company reserves the right to re-designate or revise your position or work description at any time, with written notice.

If you accept this offer, your start date will be {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.custom_joining_date) }} or another mutually agreed-upon date.

Please note that this offer letter is valid for 3 days from the date of release. If not accepted within this timeframe, the offer will be considered null and void.

The offer of employment is contingent upon satisfactory references. A formal Letter of Appointment will be issued on your joining date.

We wish you all the best and look forward to welcoming you to the Flamingo Infinite Group.

For {{ doc.company }}.

{{doc.custom_reporting_manager}}
Group Chief Human Resource Officer

Please note this is a computer-generated letter, hence no signature
